svg.text: Limited connectivity, low device access, minimal digital literacy
Basic connectivity, shared devices, emerging digital skills
Reliable connectivity, personal devices, confident digital use
Rwanda's mesh network deployment combined with
SMS governance and peer-training reduced digital
divide barriers by 40% in rural communities
Bangladesh's phased approach started with SMS
access, evolving to community device hubs and
then local servers with 85% uptime during monsoons
Digital Commons Framework - Digital Divide Transformation Visualization
